    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Solitaire()
      Creates a Solitaire game with 52 cards, 7 piles, and 4 foundations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean canAddToFoundation​(Card card, int index)
      Determines if a card can be added to the given foundation.
      void createStock()
      Creates a new deck and randomly shuffles it to make the stock.
      void deal()
      Makes 7 piles, each with an incremented number of cards.
      void dealOneCard()
      Deals one card from the stock to the waste.
      void dealThreeCards()
      Deals three cards from the stock to the waste.
      void foundationClicked​(int index)
      Called when the foundation is clicked to move cards there.
      Card getFoundationCard​(int index)
      Returns the card at the top of the foundation pile of index.

      Returns the pile at the given index.
      Card getStockCard()
      Returns the card at the top of the stock.
      Card getWasteCard()
      Returns the card at the top of the waste.
      boolean isGameOver()
      Determines if the foundations are filled, which means game over.
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Creates a Solitaire game to play.
      void pileClicked​(int index)
      Called when a pile is clicked to either add cards from the waste, another pile, or select and unselect a pile.
      void resetStock()
      Resets the stock if the waste is empty.
      void stockClicked()
      Called when the stock is clicked to either deal 3 cards or reset the stock.
      void wasteClicked()
      Called when the waste is clicked to either select or unselect the waste.

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Determines if the foundations are filled, which means game over.
        Returns:
        true if the game is over; otherwise, false

      • resetStock

        public void resetStock()
        Resets the stock if the waste is empty.

      • canAddToFoundation

        public boolean canAddToFoundation​(Card card,
                                  int index)
        Determines if a card can be added to the given foundation.
        Parameters:
        card - the card to be added to the foundation
        index - the index of the foundation
        Returns:
        true if the card can be added successfully; otherwise, false

      • pileClicked

        public void pileClicked​(int index)
        Called when a pile is clicked to either add cards from the waste, another pile, or select and unselect a pile.

        index - the index of the pile that is clicked
